Equipped with Snapdragon 695, a 5G processor built on 6nm production technology, POCO X4 Pro 5G is a contender rather than comparative one : The octa—core CPU consist of two ARM Cortex—A78 performance cores with a speed of up to 2.2GHz : in addition to 8GB of RAM, POCO X4 Pro 5G offers an extra 3GB transformed from the 256GB of ROM, thanks to Dynamic RAM Expansion Technology

Coming with a whopping 5000mAh battery, POCO X4 Pro 5G excels daily tasks : in about 20 minutes, the 67W turbo charging enables the device to be charged from 0 Percent to 70 Percent and to 100 Percent in 41 minutes : POCO X4 Pro 5G brings unparalleled immersive experience by offering dual speakers, Z—axis linear motor and the latest version of MIUI 13 with new features and performance improvements
